item.summary: Font missing when building from source makes build fail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This bug is surprising because we have a Jenkins server that does a build after each commit so this should have happened before, but it never did.

isartor-6-3-4-t01-fail-c.pdf has a non embedded font "KozMinPro-Regular-Acro-UniJIS-UCS2-H" so PDFBox tries to get a fallback font. On my system it is ArialUnicodeMS. My theory is that your font NotoSansCoptic-Regular.ttf was available at start time but was removed later. Have a look at the file ".pdfbox.cache" in your user directory.

The first stack trace is non fatal. But a look at the code shows that getFont() returns null and things go downhill from there so I'll improve that.
